description: Demolish existing buildings. Erection of new residential buildings 1-3 storeys high (Blocks A and block A houses) and 3-5 storeys high (Block B and block C) to provide 68 dwellings. Block A comprising 2x2 bedroom flats, 2x3 bedroom flats, and six x four bedroom houses. Blocks B and C comprising 6xstudio flats, 18x1 bedroom flats, 26x2 bedroom flats and 8x3 bedroom flats. Associated parking and landscaping. Access from Chigwell Road via two new vehicular cross-overs. MAJOR APPLICATION
